name: Living Hell
description:
Breath Life into this water droplet as he goes down into hell, to extinguish the demons that control the depths of the almighty darkness, to then come against the devil him self!

this game was made by a solo developer following BlackThornProds 2D Top down action course feel free to leave a comment and tell me how i did!

Controls:

WASD - Move

LeftMouse - Shoot
